title: Google AI Edge Gallery: Now with audio and on Google Play
summary: Google AI Edge has expanded the Gemma 3n preview to include audio support. Users can play with it on their own mobile phone using the Google AI Edge Gallery, which is now available in Open Beta on Play Store.
content: Google AI Edge has expanded the Gemma 3n preview to include audio support. Users can play with it on their own mobile phone using the Google AI Edge Gallery, which is now available in Open Beta on Play Store.
